text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Hey~~~~ Tore-cchi~~~. Do I really have to eat all of this?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Uhee~……Ramen, avocado salad, sweet potatoes, a ton of hard boiled eggs……and there's still more……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: If I take in all these calories, it'll ruin my style though! At the very least can I swap the noodles to konnyaku?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: 『Sensei, is this on? Yaaaay♪ Hey hey, are there any filters on?』

text_block_list.name: Vivlos' Instructor
text_block_list.text: 『Vivlos, stop messing around――』

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: 『I got it! 1600m right? I'll go run it now~』
When I was watching Vivlos' training videos…… I felt that if I were to work together with her, she would need to build up some more stamina.
Races were an intense thing. After a run, you would be extremely exhausted and it could take weeks to recover. It would be even tougher on someone dainty like Vivlos.
Particularly if you were considering an overseas campaign, it was essential to build up your body to endure that racing life……so for now, she should eat.
choice_data_list: It's to prepare you for Dubai!
It's to prepare you for Dubai!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: I got it……I'll do my best to eat! For the sake of being a Celeb, thanks for the meal!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ――Nheeeeee……I've never been so full in my life……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Yeah……praise me more?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Mmmm~ more!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Oh my, I guess that's all~

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Hehee…… kind of like Onee-chan♪

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: My oldest sister! Chevacchi never spoils me after all.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan is cool, pretty, and really kind. And more than that, super strong……――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ……Hey, Trainer-san. Can you spoil me just a little bit more?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: You see, I……have another goal other than Dubai. And that's……the Triple Tiara!
A title given to the one that wins the 『Oka Sho』, 『Oaks』, and 『Shuuka Sho』……there was an Uma Musume that had recently achieved that.
Gentildonna――she had magnificently become a Triple Tiara Uma Musume. And the one that had come in second each time……was Verxina.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: To become a sparkly Celeb in Dubai, first I need to become Queen in Japan, after all.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ……and they're the races that Onee-chan lost in too. As a little sister, it'd be something like revenge ……if I won, it'd be pretty emotional right?
choice_data_list: I suppose it would be emotional……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ah, you're thinking that I haven't thought this through aren't you? It's fine, I know already! Because, Onee-chan……she's really really strong.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: But she didn't win. Chevacchi is super strong too, and even now I think she's struggling……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Even those two have trouble, so I know races are incredible. But that's why! I'm the one that has to do it, right?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Besides, I definitely have the talent, right!? Right!?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ――What you just said……are you serious?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ah, Onee-chan! And Chevacchi too~!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: I thought you were feeling down lately but……looks like you're feeling better now. That's great but……

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: But, regarding the Triple Tiara, that's the first I've heard about it from you. But you see…… the Twinkle Series is quite difficult you know?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Muuu. I already――
choice_data_list: I think Vivlos already knows that

text_block_list.text: Of course, she'd realize just how difficult it was herself, but she was an intelligent girl and had a good grasp of her surroundings. She also had alot of respect for her sisters.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ehehee. Ain't that right, Tore-cchi♪ Keep the headpats coming~

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: A-aren't you being a little too familiar……?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: But, she wouldn't let her guard down like that if she didn't trust them. So……

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ……I'm sorry about that Vivlos. I already know that too. I know that you're someone who thinks things through.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Onee-chan……

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: But I still can't help worrying. To me, you'll always be like a flighty little girl who's always smiling.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Cheval, you too. That's why, when it comes to you two, I can't help but step in…… But, now you're both walking your own paths.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, please take good care of Vivlos! Your big sisters will be watching over you, you know? We'll be cheering you on! Right?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: ……if it's you, you'll probably be fine though. D-do your best……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ……Yeah. Onee-chan, Chevacchi……thank you!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Hey, since we've finally formed a contract after all~. Don't you think we should celebrate with a party boat?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Ah, wait. Don't you think a normal party limousine would work? Tore-cchi, which do you think is better? Should we rent out a pool?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: But, but, as a future celeb, it has to be a party boat! Looking forward to it, Tore-cchi♪
……I have a feeling that saving money is going to be important from now on, but I've decided to take on the Twinkle Series with Vivlos. However――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Hmm?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: I won't stop♪ Besides~……it's not like you hate it, right?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Nihihi, I can tell just by looking at your eyes♪ Together, we'll fly all around the world, right, Tore-cchi♡?
